LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallSimple.label: cook stack of small simple meals
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallSimple.description: Cook fifteen straightforward meals from one ingredient, sized for something smaller than a human.
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallSimple.jobString: Cooking stack of small simple meals.
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallFine.label: cook stack of small fine meals
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallFine.description: Cook fifteen somewhat complex meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients, sized for something smaller than a human.
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallFine.jobString: Cooking stack of small fine meals.
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallLavish.label: cook stack of small lavish meals
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallLavish.description: Cook fifteen very complex meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted. Sized for something smaller than a human.
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallLavish.jobString: Cooking stack of small lavish meals.
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallSurvival.label: cook stack of small packaged survival meals
LanguageData.CookMealStackSmallSurvival.description: Prepare fifteen packaged survival meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients, sized for something smaller than a human. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.
LanguageData.CookStackAvaliSpicyJerky.label: cook stack of spicy jerky
LanguageData.CookStackAvaliSpicyJerky.description: Cooks fifteen chunks of seasoned jerky, popular with hunters and explorers.
LanguageData.CookStackAvaliPiruNoodle.label: cook stack of piru noodles
LanguageData.CookStackAvaliPiruNoodle.description: Cooks fifteen sweet noodles made from Piru frond flour, a staple of Avali students.
LanguageData.CookStackAvaliKiriCurry.label: cook stack of kiri curry
LanguageData.CookStackAvaliKiriCurry.description: Cooks fifteen spicy meat noodles with a rich Kiri sauce.
LanguageData.CookStackAvaliTaco.label: cook stack of Avalon-style tacos
LanguageData.CookStackAvaliTaco.description: Cooks fifteen super-hot Nakati-spiced tacos; sometimes eaten on a dare by non-Avali.
